DOC.brief_summary: The propose study randomize control trial compare effectiveness electronic personalize health screen app incorporate motivational feedback ( i.e. , `` Check Yourself '' ) usual care . The purpose study determine whether Check Yourself effective usual care reduce health risk behavior improve quality care among adolescent receive primary health care service .
DOC.criteria: Eligible individual 1318 year old appointment see provider participate clinic able read comprehend English . Individuals exclude study : meet age requirement , appointment participate clinic , lack mean complete followup interview ( i.e. , neither telephone internet access ) , sibling has/is enrol study and/or able read comprehend English .
